page.title: 02A survey of local households
page.content:
100 households were surveyed on a variety of local issues and aspects of living in Rubery. The results were as follows: {1.How long have you lived in Rubery? 10years:11% 40years:21% 20years:20% 50years:27% 30years:21% {2.How long has your spouse lived here} Same as Householder: 70% {3.What age are the occupants of your {house?} under-5yrs:5% 36-50yrs:23% 6-15 :17% 51-65 :17% 16-25 :18% 65+ :13% 26-35 : 7%
{4.Do you travel to your job? Yes: 50% No: 20% Retired:30% {5.What form of transport do you use? Bus:8% Cycle:4% Lift:8% Train:4% Car:64% walk:12%
